fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

loopRoutine.note: Deal each player a hand of cards

gameStartRoutine.note: Draw a random card to auction

label-guide-2p.text:
Cards Used:		0-10
Starting Hand:	13 cards
Magic Number:	7 tricks

label-guide-3p.text:
Cards Used:		0-10
Starting Hand:	13 cards
Magic Number:	4 tricks

label-guide-4p.text:
Cards Used:		0-12
Starting Hand:	13 cards
Magic Number:	3 tricks

label-guide-5p.text:
Cards Used:		0-15
Starting Hand:	14 cards
Magic Number:	3 tricks

enterRoutine.comment: Default variable name is the name of the property, so we use that in LABEL below

thenRoutine.note: Winner takes back their played bid cards

loopRoutine.note: Everyone else pays
Everyone pays their blind bid
Everyone takes back their failed bid cards into their hand
Set all X text back to pass text
Set pass button color back to normal

clickRoutine.note: Move the auction card won by active player to their prestige pile
Draw a new card to auction for next round

info.name: Illuminati
info.attribution:
Game layout and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0. The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and under CC BY 3.0: * All Seeing Eye: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/all-seeing-eye.html * Chewed Skull: https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/chewed-skull.html * Blindfold: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/blindfold.html * Card Joker: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/card-joker.html
Library image and background from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license: 
* https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/hand-drawn-boho-background_16680307.htm
info.description: Gain prestige towards joining the illuminati, and avoid scandal along the way.
info.similarAwards:
1995 Meeples Choice Award Nominee
1995 Fairplay  la carte Runner-up

label-normalauction.text:
Normal Auction:

 Winner pays; everyone else takes back their bid

label-reverseauction.text:
Reverse Auction: 

 First player to pass takes back their bid; everyone else pays

label-blindauction.text:
Blind Auction: 

Everyone must bid
one card face down;
highest unique bid wins; everyone pays

label-12.text:
12* card:

Everyone else takes back their highest previously played money card
